html:
Cognixion Inc, a US-based neural interface startup creates AI-powered products for individuals with disabilities, has secured USD12 million in seed funding, led by Prime Movers Lab, Northwell Health, Amazon Alexa Fund and Volta Circle

Andreas Forsland is the founder of Cognixion.

Deal In Brief

Deal Value (US$ Million)12
Deal TypeVenture Finance
Sub-CategorySeed
Deal StatusCompleted: 2021-11-16

Deal Participants

Target (Company)Cognixion Inc.
Acquirer 1 (Company)Undisclosed Investor(s)
Acquirer 2 (Company)Amazon Alexa Fund
Acquirer 3 (Company)Volta Circle Ltd
Acquirer 4 (Company)Prime Movers Lab
Acquirer 5 (Company)Northwell Health Inc

Deal Rationale

Cognixion intends to use the funding to develop new adaptive interfaces for Assisted Reality technology.
